languages.text: Люди спасаются бегством, но самых слабых и медленных настигают падшие космодесантники. Наигравшись с добычей, Несущие Слово отбывают с планеты.
The people run for their lives, but the fallen behemoths catch up to the weaker stragglers. Having toyed with their prey long enough, the Word Bearers leave the planet.
languages.original_text: Люди спасаются бегством, но самых слабых и медленных настигают падшие космодесантники. Наигравшись с добычей, Несущие Слово отбывают с планеты.

traits.locale_text: The people run for their lives, but the fallen behemoths catch up to the weaker stragglers. Having toyed with their prey long enough, the Word Bearers leave the planet.
The colony's population leave their homes behind and flee for their lives.

The people run for their lives, but the fallen behemoths catch up to the weaker stragglers. Having toyed with their prey long enough, the Word Bearers leave the planet.

languages.text: Malgré le sauve-qui-peut général, les mastodontes déchus parviennent à rattraper les malheureux retardataires. Une fois lassés de jouer avec leurs proies, les Word Bearers finissent par quitter la planète.
languages.original_text: The people run for their lives, but the fallen behemoths catch up to the weaker stragglers. Having toyed with their prey long enough, the Word Bearers leave the planet.

traits.locale_text: Malgré le sauve-qui-peut général, les mastodontes déchus parviennent à rattraper les malheureux retardataires. Une fois lassés de jouer avec leurs proies, les Word Bearers finissent par quitter la planète.

languages.text: 人々は命からがら逃げ出すが、倒れた巨大生物は逃げ遅れた者に追いついてきた。思う存分獲物を弄んでから、ワードベアラーは惑星を去った。
languages.original_text: The people run for their lives, but the fallen behemoths catch up to the weaker stragglers. Having toyed with their prey long enough, the Word Bearers leave the planet.

traits.locale_text: 人々は命からがら逃げ出すが、倒れた巨大生物は逃げ遅れた者に追いついてきた。思う存分獲物を弄んでから、ワードベアラーは惑星を去った。

languages.text: 人们争先恐后地逃命，但邪恶的庞然巨物追上了那些弱小的掉队者。到最后，怀言者军团终于玩弄完了他们的猎物，离开了这颗行星。
languages.original_text: The people run for their lives, but the fallen behemoths catch up to the weaker stragglers. Having toyed with their prey long enough, the Word Bearers leave the planet.

traits.locale_text: 人们争先恐后地逃命，但邪恶的庞然巨物追上了那些弱小的掉队者。到最后，怀言者军团终于玩弄完了他们的猎物，离开了这颗行星。

languages.text: La gente corre por sus vidas, pero las bestias caídas alcanzan a los rezagados más débiles. Tras juguetear con sus presas, los Portadores de la Palabra abandonan el planeta.
languages.original_text: The people run for their lives, but the fallen behemoths catch up to the weaker stragglers. Having toyed with their prey long enough, the Word Bearers leave the planet.

traits.locale_text: La gente corre por sus vidas, pero las bestias caídas alcanzan a los rezagados más débiles. Tras juguetear con sus presas, los Portadores de la Palabra abandonan el planeta.

languages.text: Die Leute rennen um ihr Leben, doch die gefallenen Kolosse holen die schwächeren Nachzügler ein. Nachdem sie lange genug mit ihrer Beute gespielt haben, verlassen die Word Bearers den Planeten.
languages.original_text: The people run for their lives, but the fallen behemoths catch up to the weaker stragglers. Having toyed with their prey long enough, the Word Bearers leave the planet.

traits.locale_text: Die Leute rennen um ihr Leben, doch die gefallenen Kolosse holen die schwächeren Nachzügler ein. Nachdem sie lange genug mit ihrer Beute gespielt haben, verlassen die Word Bearers den Planeten.

languages.text: Koloni nüfusu, evlerini geride bırakıp can havliyle kaçıyor.
languages.original_text: The people run for their lives, but the fallen behemoths catch up to the weaker stragglers. Having toyed with their prey long enough, the Word Bearers leave the planet.
